headline: CrowdStrike Named a Customers’ Choice in the 2026 Gartner Peer Insights™ ‘Voice of the Customer’ for Application Security Posture Management (ASPM) Tools Report
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, February 03, 2026--CrowdStrike (NASDAQ: CRWD) today announced its recognition as a Customers’ Choice in the 2026 Gartner Peer Insights™ ‘Voice of the Customer’ for Application Security Posture Management (ASPM) Tools report.1 CrowdStrike received the top customer ratings across product capabilities and highest rating for deployment experience of all the vendors evaluated. headline: CrowdStrike Announces Date of Fourth Quarter and Fiscal Year 2026 Financial Results Conference Call
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, February 03, 2026--CrowdStrike Holdings, Inc. (Nasdaq: CRWD), today announced that it will release financial results for its fourth quarter and fiscal year 2026 ended January 31, 2026 after the U.S. market close on Tuesday, March 3, 2026. CrowdStrike will host a conference call that day at 2:00 p.m. Pacific time (5:00 p.m. Eastern time) to discuss the results.
